body:
## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

Android Studio `3.0 Beta 2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 23.2.1` • Dart plugin `171.4424`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

com/android/tools/idea/observable/core/StringProperty


comment_data.body:
Thanks for the report!

These versions:

```
Android Studio 3.0 Beta 2
Flutter plugin 23.2.1
```

are 6+ months old; I'd recommend upgrading to the latest (android studio 3.2, and the latest flutter plugin).

title: Error getting Flutter sdk information.
